title: Penny-vvis[e] pound foolish or, a Bristovv diamond, set in t[wo] rings, and both crack'd Profitable for married men, pleasant for young men, a[nd a] rare example for all good women.
author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] for Edward Blackmore, and are to [be] sould in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Angell,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
